时间退回到2005年，彼时的我刚上小学第一次接触到了cs当时还是大屁股电脑玩的还是初代cs当时家里没有电脑整天看别人玩cs无比羡慕，时间推进到2007年我爸妈去中关村买了家里第一台电脑TCL的液晶屏电脑当年售价四五千算是市面上比较牛逼的电脑了（当然是说为了学习）然后我开始了各种游戏：红警魔兽杀手cs真三国无双横世霸业........到了2012年左右算是我玩cs系列的高峰期csol和初代还有1.6当时在学校兴趣小组放假集训和老师同学在iceworld图上对狙的日子还历历在目（这可能是我至今为止人生中为数不多的快乐时光）.........cs的基本上每一代每个版本哪怕是韩国代理的ol我都玩过很多的记忆在眼前闪回最后一次上线玩1.6还是15年的事情当时在网吧无所事事然后去玩了cs本以为会快乐但却完全没有了当年的感觉时光真的不留情转眼间从接触到现在已经十几年了（中间断断续续的在玩也一直没坚持玩）到去年玩了go很多东西都大变样了甚至于go里面的仓库图我都没看出来是仓库....很多东西都在变化但是希望我的初心永远不会改变 也希望当年陪伴我的和现在陪伴我的游戏玩家能越来越好                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                      记于2019.12.28
the godfather of defense and attack.A+
Классная игра, помню малым играл, рекомендую

Counter-Strike: Source

It is possible to say that everything started because of a game. Yes, just one game. I'm talking about "Counter".

As a matter of fact, the article you are currently reading is very dangerous in terms of its author, that is, it can make me vizier or disgrace. Wherever I grab and start writing, it tends to break off that tip and break into small pieces. Because I know that I live in a generation of blood and the main target audience of the article is those who love this game. I also know that I breathe the same air as people who limit the game culture and universe in the computer world to "dust" or "aztec", who open an internet cafe just to make money from it, and who are not related to the PC even though they are CS crazy. Many people know that I do not like this game and that I do not like the person who loves it depending on the situation. I can easily show the same people spinning around in the same places regularly for weeks, even years, and playing it enthusiastically every day as if they did nothing different than the day before. Personally, I get bored after three or five games that I play for fun, and I have never been to internet cafes just to play this, as I have never installed CS on my computer. Actually, I am not watching the ones who are not tired of this game even though it has been a long time; because while they devote their lives to just one game, I have to follow the market and adapt to all games. But what could be the finger of someone who hates CS so much? The answer is hidden to the right of these two dots: Source !

Indeed, it is impossible to believe that the word next to this exceptional punctuation adds to the game. Although all the maps we know remain the same in general terms, the change in details takes people to completely different lands. As you navigate the map, you pay more attention to details than your enemies, and you are tired of Source (?) At the freedom of their tactical use. As you know, Source is the graphics software Valve uses in Half-Life2. Its combination with CS reveals emotions you have never experienced in the game. Valve is experimenting with Source, with a work that will fill its regulars 100 percent and get a CS opponent like me into its ranks. Taking into account what awaits us at HL2 in the face of such an experiment, my patience limits are once again pushed. We cannot ignore the fact that systems are negatively affected by the additions of Source to CS. Although not much performance loss is perceived, the new graphics hardware shows itself a little while playing the game over the internet. When connected to foreign servers with 1024Kb ADSL, a fps amount between 35-40 can be said to be satisfactory in terms of these graphic details and location. It is even possible to access one local server right now.

Although it has advantages that cannot be compared with previous versions of CS, Source has a small minus with the limited number of maps compared to them. CS and CS: Even though I don't remember how many there are in CZ, and although it is known that most of them are not played intensely anyway, Valve members have opted for Source in Source to protect the favorite maps of the players from the previous series in the next generation games. dust, dust2, office, havana, aztec are some of the 8 maps that appear in the game. My favorite part, italy, is taking its place in the game in all its glory (fortunately I don't like CS!). Likewise, there were not many additions or reductions in weapons over the previous games. But the details have increased and they have gained a much more realistic appearance. The moment you touch the trigger, you fully realize the feeling that you have a gun in your hand, as well as the saturated resonance of bullets and empty cartridges. It is obvious that a lot of work has been done on the same models. As the simplest example, I can talk about the visibility of the target location in the binoculars of zoom weapons. Its constant interaction and its brightness is one word.

We said that there are many details and innovations in graphics, especially the maps were created from scratch; You've read rave words about CS from a man like me. I will continue to comeThen I will tell you with sadness. Let's take a look at what these are. First let me say that the ambiance is great. Whichever section you open, it is impossible for you not to notice the change at first. Until now I have not been able to examine all the maps in depth; however, based on what I have seen, I can say that the biggest changes occurred in the dust maps. Being able to observe the epic movement of the dust from the sand that formed a cloud close to the ground, and to say that this is the case, may be appropriate as it makes me judge what we will see in HL2, although it saddens me for CS. Broad-leaved trees and minarets placed around, plus the colors harmoniously with each other. If I go to Aztec, we can say that Source adds new definitions to the appearance of rain and water. It is worth seeing the realistic ringing in the water with the splashing sound when you press the water. By the way, you will remember the boxes that were scattered across the maps in previous games of CS. Barrels are generally noticeable in Source. The barrels and all the other small movable gadgets seem to have been put there to show the beauty of Source. If bullets or you hit them, they act by reacting sensibly and they also create an infrastructure for tactical use.

Similarly, the characters in the game wobble as they should normally when they eat bullets and die, and fall left and right within the framework of the laws of physics. Rag-doll effects work successfully, on top of that, the texture of the blood that comes out of your body when you hit it and creates stains on the walls also adds to the visuality. In other words, corpses suspended in the air or inside walls will not be able to disturb our eyes, thanks to Source. Let's talk about the fact that the money system in the game is protected in the same way. Besides the polishing in the graphics and the effects of Source on physics, there is not much addition to the overall game. But don't let this word be misunderstood; because even this gave a brand new breath to the game. Everything comes to your screens as usual, just clean, detailed and beautiful graphics.

In addition to these, the bomb kit is also available in the game with the same old models. Beyond its effects, its visual aspects have been greatly improved. For example, a grenade exploding near you does not only affect your health, it also shakes your ears. For a few seconds your ability to hear disappears and a high-pitched voice prevails. I will be proud to point out the one in FarCry to tell you about the effect of the flash bomb, while your screen will turn gray with a smoke bomb in a very different way than before. Of course, I thought that the whole game was a trial board before HL2, but it is possible while playing the game. Because the glitches in some parts of the physics engine are very noticeable. The recoil that occurs when you touch barrels and moving objects is very evident throughout the game. It could be a bug, it could be patched; but, HL2 I'm sure it won't come up like this.

После многочисленных каток в CS:GO начал сильно интересоваться CS: Source. Это что-то вроде модернизации CS16. Понравилось качество звука, графики на максимальной настройке, управление и многое другое.
